title: Moby Dick by Herman Melville
description: Follow the harrowing journey of Captain Ahab as he hunts the elusive white whale, Moby Dick, in this epic tale of obsession.
points: Philosophical exploration of obsession
A monumental work of American literature
Rich symbolism and deep themes

title: Pride and Prejudice by Jane Austen
description: Step into the world of 19th-century England, where love, wit, and societal expectations converge in this timeless classic.
points: Exploration of societal norms
A tale of love and misunderstandings
One of literature's most cherished works

title: The Lord of the Rings by J.R.R. Tolkien
description: Venture into Middle-earth and join Frodo and his companions in their quest to destroy the One Ring and save the world.
points: Epic fantasy with rich world-building
A timeless story of good vs. evil
Iconic characters and themes of friendship

title: Dune by Frank Herbert
description: Immerse yourself in a sprawling epic of politics, religion, and ecology on the desert planet of Arrakis.
points: Groundbreaking science fiction
Rich world-building and complex themes
A saga that redefined the genre

title: The Hobbit by J.R.R. Tolkien
description: Join Bilbo Baggins on his unexpected journey through Middle-earth in this classic tale of adventure and friendship.
points: A beloved fantasy adventure
Themes of courage, friendship, and self-discovery
A prelude to 'The Lord of the Rings'

title: Life of Pi by Yann Martel
description: Follow Pi Patel's extraordinary survival story after being stranded on a lifeboat in the Pacific Ocean with a Bengal tiger.
points: A profound exploration of faith and survival
Rich in symbolism and metaphors
A captivating, life-affirming narrative

title: The Shining by Stephen King
description: Enter the haunted Overlook Hotel with Jack Torrance and his family in this chilling psychological horror masterpiece.
points: Masterful suspense and psychological terror
Explores themes of isolation and madness
One of Stephen King's most iconic works

title: The Kite Runner by Khaled Hosseini
description: Experience a deeply moving story of friendship, betrayal, and redemption set against the backdrop of Afghanistan's tumultuous history.
points: Heartbreaking and redemptive
Explores themes of guilt, friendship, and sacrifice
A contemporary classic of modern literature

title: To Kill a Mockingbird by Harper Lee
description: Experience a powerful tale of justice, morality, and the human spirit in the American South.
points: Timeless exploration of racial issues
Heartfelt and impactful storytelling
A Pulitzer Prize-winning masterpiece

title: The Alchemist by Paulo Coelho
description: Embark on a mystical journey with Santiago, a shepherd, as he seeks his personal legend and discovers the true meaning of life.
points: A fable about following your dreams
Explores themes of destiny and self-discovery
A modern classic with a timeless message
